name: Stalker Specter
description: Deploys a clone of the Stalker to fight for you.

languages.description: Setzt einen Stalker-Klon ein, der für dich kämpft.
languages.name: Stalker-Phantom

languages.description: Déploie un clone du Stalker qui combat pour vous.
languages.name: Spectre de Stalker

languages.description: Schiera un clone dello Stalker che combatte per te.
languages.name: Spettro Stalker

languages.description: 당신을 위해 싸워줄 스토커의 복제품을 소환합니다.
languages.name: 스토커 스펙터

languages.description: Despliega un clon de Stalker para que luche por ti.
languages.name: Espectro de Stalker

languages.description: 部署一名追猎者分身为你作战。
languages.name: 追猎者魅影

languages.description: Создаёт клон Сталкера, который будет сражаться за вас.
languages.name: Спектр Сталкера

languages.description: Stalkerクローンを味方として出撃させる。
languages.name: Stalker スペクター

languages.description: Tworzy klon Stalkera, który walczy po Twojej stronie.
languages.name: Widmo Stalkera

languages.description: Posicionará um clone do Stalker para lutar por você.
languages.name: Espectro do Stalker

languages.description: 部署一名 Stalker 分身為你作戰。
languages.name: Stalker 魅影

languages.description: ใช้ร่างโคลนของ Stalker ให้สู้เพื่อคุณ
languages.name: สเปกเตอร์ Stalker

languages.description: Senin adına savaşması için bir Stalker klonu yaratır.
languages.name: Stalker Specter

languages.description: Розміщує на полі бою клона Сталкера, який допомагатиме вам.
languages.name: Тінь Сталкера
